title: Local: Auto-connect to cloud
description:
Add cloud connection to local tickboard:
- Read token from ~/.tickboardrc or TICKBOARD_TOKEN env
- If token present, connect wss://tickboard.io/agent on startup
- Register board: name (from .tick or dir name), machine ID
- Handle relayed HTTP requests, return responses
- Reconnect with exponential backoff
- Graceful fallback if cloud unreachable (local-only mode)
